About Me

Uddhav P. Gautam

Founder, RGR Innovate LLC

I work at the intersection of the Linux kernel, eBPF, and IoT systems. My research focuses on system performance, observability, and security—developing lightweight tracing tools, optimizing kernel instrumentation, and enabling real-time protection for Bluetooth, networking, and kernel protocols. I also develop and maintain Android apps for RGR Innovate LLC that I own.

Refer to LinkedIn Profile for more information about me.

Email LinkedIn Scholar GitHub

Research is the compass that guides us through the ever-changing landscape of technology.
